attributes.action: intervene in the planned closure of Bron Y Foel primary school, Y Fron, Caernarfon, Gwynedd.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, petition the Prime Minister to intervene in Gwynedd County Council’s plan to close Bron Y Foel primary school, Y Fron, Caernarfon, Gwynedd. 

Gwynedd County Council do not seem to have taken into consideration the drastic consequences closing this primary school will have. They certainly have not taken into account the effect it will have on the children who attend the special needs unit.

Educating our children is paramount. It is to this end that this primary school has invested in our children’s future. The teachers do a fantastic job and all our children look forward to going to school daily.
